replies.body: We were on winter break, which was why you didn't see a ton of updates on our end. We're back on our normal PBE updates again!

According to rioter's tweets, PBE should be updated next week. 

https://twitter.com/RiotFeithen/status/684139448028672001?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw

> [{quoted}](name=OverpoweredSoap,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=AMIEZTVj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-05T17:42:01.741+0000)
>
> According to rioter's tweets, PBE should be updated next week. 
> 
> https://twitter.com/RiotFeithen/status/684139448028672001?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw

next week ? omfg i am soo fking bored,,,, I want ranked teambuilder ... I want jhin announced... I want thunderlords nerfed... I want zed toned down .. I want the new season to start,,,, I want this new reward system with the keys and whatnot to start,,, I want to play ranked in the new season ... I am SOOO bored of the game right now ... I litterally had all the time in the world to type this... PLEASE RIOT hurry up ...
This is for Patch 6.2. [Patch 6.1](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/01/15-pbe-update.html) PBE updates are already being deployed. Patch 6.1 will arrive on January 13th or thereabout.
This is for Patch 6.2. [Patch 6.1](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/01/15-pbe-update.html) PBE updates are already being deployed.
Nah. They just took a winter break. After the next patch goes through it'll resume regular content.

ey!

hopefully we've got some updates to that awful morgana skin.
